import React from "react" import styles from "./Topdeals.module.css" import image1 from "./Extras/topdealsimage1.webp" import image2 from "./Extras/image2.webp" import image3 from "./Extras/image3.webp" import image4 from "./Extras/image4.webp" import leftbtn from "./Extras/leftbtn.png" import rightbtn from "./Extras/rightbtn.png" import showcaseimage1 from "./Extras/showcaseimage1.webp" export class Topdeals extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state={ index:0, showcaseindex:0, imageslider:[image1, image2, image3, image4], sliderheaders:["Unleash your School Spirits", "Galaxy Tab Series", "Galaxy Book series", "Odyssey OLED G8"], sliderdescription:["Avail benifits upto Rs. 10000", "Avail benifits upto Rs. 22000", "Avail benifits upto Rs. 17000", "Avail benifits upto Rs. 13000"], colors:[{white:"white", black:"black"}] } } nextImgSlider(){ if (this.state.index < this.state.imageslider.length - 1){ return this.state.index + 1 } else{ return (this.state.imageslider.length - 1) } } prevImgSlider(){ if (this.state.index > 0){ return this.state.index - 1 } else{ return 0 } } changeColor(index, color){ return this.state.colors[index][color] } render(){ return(

{this.state.sliderheaders[this.state.index]}

{this.state.sliderdescription[this.state.index]}

Best Deals

Galaxy Book3, 39.62cm (15.6"), i5, 8GB, Intel Xe Graphics

Galaxy Book3, 39.62cm (15.6"), i5, 8GB, Intel Xe Graphics

GRID ITEM 3
GRID ITEM 4
GRID ITEM 5
GRID ITEM 6
GRID ITEM 7
GRID ITEM 8
) } }
